description: The kids will love these banana and coconut bliss balls as a snack in their school lunch box. They're quick to make, budget-friendly and are nutritionally approved.
keywords: Bliss & protein ball,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Budget,Banana,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Banana and Coconut Balls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place all the ingredients, except coconut, in a food processor. Blitz for 20 seconds or until well combined. Place coconut in a bowl. Roll tablespoonfuls of mixture into balls, then roll in coconut to coat. Place on a large plate and refrigerate until ready to serve.
